name: Mocha Mulatto
description:
A simple rich and creamy White Chocolate Mocha.   
HAPPY MIXING, & HAPPY VAPING!!! :)
author: soulchkn

reviews.text: I mixed this up and waited for that semisweet chocolate flavor to pop, and it didn't for me.  Maybe a "Mulato" is supposed to be less darker chocolate forward?  If so, this could be exactly what the mixer had in mind.  I also wonder if this was created for the vaper that uses the drip method?  I have a tank.  All 3 versions of the Falcon.  I prefer recipes that do well in my tank.  If you like a gentle "white" vape.. here you go!  no off notes yet no chocolate coffee notes either.
